articles.title: 10 body language cues to know if someone is lying, as per psychology - The Times of India
articles.description: According to psychology, lies can be detected through body language cues. There is certain common behaviour observed in liars that may indicate deception. Here we list down 10 such body language cues.
articles.content: At times when someone lies, they might unintentionally let slip the truth, but then in an attempt to cover it up, resort to manipulation, resulting in contradictions.
